hero.title: Molochain World!
hero.subtitle: for Modern Business
hero.description: Streamline your supply chain with our comprehensive logistics solutions. Whether you're a business or individual, we've got you covered.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive logistics solutions for your business needs

freight.title: Freight Shipping
freight.description: Global freight solutions for businesses of all sizes

tools.title: Transportation Tools
tools.freightCalculatorDesc: Calculate shipping costs based on weight, dimensions, and destination
tools.dimensionalWeightDesc: Calculate volumetric weight for your shipments
tools.packagingGuideDesc: Get recommendations for optimal packaging solutions
tools.routePlannerDesc: Plan efficient delivery routes and estimate transit times
tools.transitTimeDesc: Get estimated delivery times for your shipments
tools.vehicleSelectorDesc: Find the right vehicle type for your cargo

whyUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyUs.description: With years of experience and a global network, we provide reliable and efficient logistics solutions that help your business grow.

about.title: About Molo Logistics
about.subtitle: A leading force in global logistics and transportation

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: At Molo, we believe in a human-centric and collaborative approach. Every customer is not just a client but a partner and friend. Our commitment to transparency, trust, and quality service delivery has made us a credible and trustworthy brand in the global transportation industry.

globalNetwork.title: Global Network
globalNetwork.description: Operating across Europe, Africa, Russia, USA, Canada, Brazil, and Mexico

trackRecord.title: Proven Track Record
trackRecord.description: Over 60,000 TEU containers exported and 18,000 TEU containers imported annually

humanCentric.title: Human-Centric
humanCentric.description: Building lasting partnerships through collaborative customer relationships

partnerships.title: Strategic Partnerships
partnerships.description: Collaborating with major commercial companies worldwide

globalPresence.title: Global Presence
globalPresence.description: Our strategic network of warehouses and shipping routes spans major global trading hubs, enabling efficient and reliable logistics solutions worldwide.

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.description1: Molo is one of the leading organizations active in international transportation, logistics, and foreign trade, holding official licenses in Iran and Turkey. This company offers comprehensive logistics and trade services to and from key global destinations.
expertise.description2: The company's presence in Iran, Turkey, the UK, the UAE, and China strengthens its global connections and service capabilities. Moreover, Molo's membership in reputable international associations ensures fast and effective communication, enhancing the overall customer experience.
expertise.description3: Our expertise in shipping trade and freight forwarding combines complex skills, specialized knowledge, and operational execution to ensure safe, economical, and efficient global transportation.
